articles.title: Stock Market Today: Dow, S&P Live Updates for March 12 - Bloomberg
articles.description: European stocks and US equity futures gained ahead of keenly awaited US inflation data that will help determine when the Federal Reserve finally pivots to monetary easing.
articles.content:
European stocks and US equity futures gained ahead of keenly awaited US inflation data that will help determine when the Federal Reserve finally pivots to monetary easing.
